body:
![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2022/10/Copy-of-RR-H01-900-×-506-px-3.png)

__[Klik sini untuk Bahasa Melayu](https://raiz.com.my/blog/raiz-rewards-merancang-percutian-2023/)__

__17/02/2023__

__Raiz Rewards: Planning for your 2023 travel?__

Plan for your 2023 travels with our brand partners! Flight tickets, accommodations, experiences – we’ve got all covered for you. Check out our top travel partners below and their amazing deals (just in time for the school holidays!). The best part? Get cash bonus (or cashback) when you book online using “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)”! Your cashback will get invested into your Raiz account automatically.

Just go to “[__Raiz Rewards__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” in your app, search for your favourite brand, and click the “[__Book Online Here__](http://app.adjust.com/jsr?url=https%3A%2F%2Fye77.adj.st%2Fraiz_rewards%3Fadj_t%3D5tn8ue3_g8sxcfy%26adj_deep_link%3Draiz-my%253A%252F%252Fraiz_rewards%26adj_fallback%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fapp.raiz.com.my%252Frewards%26adj_deeplink_js%3D1)” button. We’ll direct you to the brand’s app or website. Book like normal, and you will be on your way to get your cashback\*.

So, as you book, you invest!

*\*Terms & Conditions apply.*

__Trip.com__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Trip.com_.png)

__(+up to 2.45% invested)__

*   Choose from over 1.2 million hotels in more than 200 countries and book flights to over 5,000 destinations worldwide with __Trip.com__!

__Airpaz__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Airpaz.png)__

__(+ 0.69% invested)__

*   __Airpaz__ provides flexible payment in local currency, local languages, effortless manage booking feature, easy booking steps, best fare calendar, and 24/7 customer support.
*   Get exclusive promotions for flights and hotels. __How?__ Just go to Raiz Rewards, choose Airpaz & tap at Book Online Here. On Airpaz’s home page, click Promo and browse for their amazing deals.

__AirAsia Flight__

__![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/AirAsia.png)__

__(+3.43% invested)__

__Special Deal: 5 million free seats!__

*   AirAsia launched its first free seats for the year with __5 million FREE\* seats__ up for grabs.
*   __Booking period: __Now – 19 February 2023
*   __Travel period:__ 1 March – 10 December 2023  
    *\*Terms & conditions apply.*

__Klook__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Klook.png)

__(+ up to 3.5% invested)__

__Special Deals: School holiday is more fun with Klook!__

*   Get __up to RM50 off__ for all family fun activities (with minimum spend of RM500)
*   Get __up to 50% off__ for popular Malaysia attractions!

__Agoda__

![](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/02/Agoda.png)

__(+2.94% invested)__

__Special Deals:__

*   Get __up to 30% off__ for international hotel rates.
*   View other deals and coupons for more savings. __How?__ Just go to Raiz Rewards, choose to Agoda & tap at Book Online Here. On Agoda’s home page, click Coupons & Deals.

[![raiz rewards](https://raiz.com.my/blog/wp-content/uploads/2021/11/Explore-Raiz-Rewards.gif)](https://ye77.adj.st/raiz_rewards?adj_t=lwt55og_doqwx9i&adj_deep_link=raiz-my%3A%2F[%E2%80%A6]iz_rewards&adj_fallback=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.raiz.com.my%2Frewards)
